text: Nia daangada nogo deemee di budu di Hagamiami o di Pasoobaa i di laangi donu i lodo tahi malama di ngadau, idimaa digau hai mee dabu ala gu hagamadammaa ang gi nia hegau dabu nogo hogoohi hua, gei nia daangada ala ne dagabuli mai gi Jerusalem le e hogoohi labelaa. Malaa King Hezekiah, mo ana gau ngalua aamua, mo nia daangada Israel guu baba bolo ginaadou gaa budu Tagamiami deelaa i lodo di lua malama, gei di king gaa hai dana hagailoo gi nia daangada huogodoo o Israel mo Judah gi lloomoi gi Jerusalem. Mee guu hihi ana lede labelaa gi nia madawaawa Ephraim mo Manasseh, gu gahigahi digaula gi lloomoi gi di Hale Daumaha i Jerusalem e budu di Hagamiami Pasoobaa e hagalaamua Dimaadua, di God o Israel.
